author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Add additional values to the ClientNotifyInformation, to bring it up to
date with the C version of the struct.
(ClientNotifyInformation): Populate the additional fields in the constructor.
(PropertyMap): If the incoming hash is null, return null.
(onNotify): Add a pool when creating the Java object.
New, along with the requisite getters.

author: gbrown
msg: Merge in JSON/bean binding changes from 1.5.1 tree.

author: gbrown
msg: Move JSON/bean binding to JSONSerializer so the JSON structure only needs to be traversed once.

author: veithen
msg: * WSCOMMONS-547: Build the binary distribution in a Maven module instead of the root project, so that the apache-release profile works.
* Removed the assembly descriptor for the source distribution. A source distribution (defined in org.apache:apache:7) is now build by default with the apache-release profile.

author: jonathan
msg: Modified to build the three books that we currently use on the web site.
